title: @RIOTKATEYKHAOS ZYRA VFX CHANGE
body:
Katey,

Was there a Visual Effects Change that was not in a patch note? I, as a Zyra Main, noticed that the passive plant being planted trail... (confusing i know) color on haunted zyra actually changed.

Thanks,
Much Love 
TSP

replies.body:
Hi! 

This isn't something I was aware of changing, no. Skins didn't touch anything on her last patch specifically.

Hey there. 

The only reason I said it was maybe it was a bug?? The trail to show the passive seed being set was green (base) and then became the haunted Zyra color when I posted it. I don't know but in any case thanks because you know my love for Zyra ❤️

Speaking of Zyra and skins, this month will be 3 years since Zyra had a skin in the rotation. I believe that is actually the longest any non-rework champ has ever gone without a skin (edit: Looks like it's been 3 weeks longer for Viktor). What's up with that?

(p.s. was holding out hope for a Pumpkin Patch Zyra for Halloween Q___Q)
